title: 94/483/EC: Commission Decision of 20 July 1994 approving an amendment to the Spanish programme of agricultural income aid for farmers in Andalusia
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 20 July 1994 approving an amendment to the Spanish programme of agricultural income aid for farmers in Andalusia (94/483/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of agricultural income aid for farmers in Andalusia notified to the Commission by the Spanish authorities on 9 March 1993, as amended by the communication of 21 March 1994, is hereby approved.

The maximum amounts that may be charged to the Community budget each year under this Decision are as follows:
